===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# {{lb|zh|countable|uncountable}} [[message]]; [[news]]; [[information]] {{zh-mw|條|個}}
#: {{zh-x|我 有 一 個 好 消息{xi}，和 一 個 壞 消息{xi}，你 想 先 聽 哪 一 個？|I have good '''news''' and I have bad '''news''' - which one would you like to hear first?}}
#: {{zh-x|等 你 好 消息{xi}。|Look forward to hearing the good '''news'''.}}

====Usage notes====
* {{zh-l|消息}} refers ''news'' as in ''new information''; to express the meaning of ''news'' as in ''reports of current events'', use {{zh-l|新聞}}.
* Note that: while in English, "[[news]]" is usually not countable, this is not the case in Mandarin, as one can say:
*: {{zh-x|兩 個 消息{xi}，三 個 消息{xi}，等等|''Two pieces of '''news''', three pieces of '''news''', etc.''}}
